instructions.price: CRITICAL: Extract price ONLY from within the #product-detail section. Look specifically for div.price-sales inside the product-detail container. IGNORE any prices outside this section, including comparison prices, recommendation prices, or other product prices. The correct price structure is: #product-detail > prices-and-availability > prices > price > price-sales.
instructions.supplementInfo: CRITICAL FOCUSED EXTRACTION: Look ONLY in these two specific HTML sections: 1) class='product-detail' id='product-detail' for basic product info, and 2) id='product-tabs' class='tabs product-tabs' for detailed information. Click 'Läs mer' button to reveal supplement details within these sections. Extract: active ingredient amount PER SERVING, dosage per unit, daily dosage instructions, and serving size calculations.
instructions.quantity: Extract quantity from #product-detail section only. Look for product size information in the main product detail area, not from other products or recommendations.

dosageExtraction.extractionInstructions: Extract dosagePerUnit as NUMBER ONLY in mg (e.g., from 'Kreatin 5g per portion' return 5000). Extract servingSize from daily dosage instructions (e.g., '1 portion dagligen' = 1, '2 teskedar' = 1 serving).
